template.template: Template DB Apache Cassandra by JMX
template.name: Template DB Apache Cassandra by JMX
template.description:
The template to monitor Apache Cassandra by Zabbix that work without any external scripts. It works with both standalone and cluster instances. The metrics are collected by JMX. You can set {$CASSANDRA.USER} and {$CASSANDRA.PASSWORD} macros in the template for using on the host level.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/410057-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-apache-cassandra
Template tooling version used: 0.39

trigger.name: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Cassandra version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Compaction: Number of completed tasks
item.description: Number of completed compactions since server [re]start.

item.name: Commitlog: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of commit log messages written but yet to be fsync'd.

item.name: Latency: Read median
item.description: Latency read from disk in milliseconds - median.

item.name: Latency: Read 75 percentile
item.description: Latency read from disk in milliseconds - p75.

item.name: Latency: Read 95 percentile
item.description: Latency read from disk in milliseconds - p95.

item.name: Commitlog: Total size
item.description: Current size, in bytes, used by all the commit log segments.

item.name: Compaction: Total compactions completed
item.description: Throughput of completed compactions since server [re]start.

item.name: Latency: Write median
item.description: Latency write to disk in milliseconds - median.

item.name: Latency: Write 75 percentile
item.description: Latency write to disk in milliseconds - p75.

item.name: Latency: Write 95 percentile
item.description: Latency write to disk in milliseconds - p95.

item.name: KeyCache: Capacity
item.description: Cache capacity in bytes.

item.name: KeyCache: Entries
item.description: Total number of cache entries.

item.name: KeyCache: HitRate
item.description: All time cache hit rate.

item.name: KeyCache: Hits per second
item.description: Rate of cache hits.

item.name: KeyCache: requests per second
item.description: Rate of cache requests.

item.name: KeyCache: Size
item.description: Total size of occupied cache, in bytes.

item.name: Client connections: Native
item.description: Number of clients connected to this nodes native protocol server.

item.name: Client connections: Trifts
item.description: Number of connected to this nodes thrift clients.

item.name: Latency: Client request read median
item.description: Total latency serving data to clients in milliseconds - median.

item.name: Latency: Client request read 75 percentile
item.description: Total latency serving data to clients in milliseconds - p75.

item.name: Latency: Client request read 95 percentile
item.description: Total latency serving data to clients in milliseconds - p95.

item.name: Client request: Read per second
item.description: The number of client requests per second.

item.name: Latency: Client request write median
item.description: Total latency serving write requests from clients in milliseconds - median.

item.name: Latency: Client request write 75 percentile
item.description: Total latency serving write requests from clients in milliseconds - p75.

item.name: Latency: Client request write 95 percentile
item.description: Total latency serving write requests from clients in milliseconds - p95.

item.name: Client request: Write per second
item.description: The number of local write requests per second.

item.name: Client request: Write Timeouts
item.description: Number of write requests timeouts encountered.

item.name: Compaction: Pending tasks
item.description: Estimated number of compactions remaining to perform.

item.name: Dropped messages: Write (Mutation)
item.description: Number of dropped regular writes messages.

item.name: Dropped messages: Read
item.description: Number of dropped regular reads messages.

item.name: Storage: Errors
item.description: Number of internal exceptions caught. Under normal exceptions this should be zero.

item.name: Storage: Used (bytes)
item.description: Size, in bytes, of the on disk data size this node manages.

trigger.name: Failed to fetch info data (or no data for 15m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 15 minutes

item.name: Storage: Hints
item.description: Number of hint messages written to this node since [re]start. Includes one entry for each host to be hinted per hint.

item.name: Thread pool HintsDispatcher: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. HintsDispatcher: Performs hinted handoff.

item.name: Thread pool HintsDispatcher: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. HintsDispatcher: Performs hinted handoff.

item.name: Thread pool HintsDispatcher: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. HintsDispatcher: Performs hinted handoff.

item.name: Thread pool MemtableFlushWriter: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. MemtableFlushWriter: Writes memtables to disk.

item.name: Thread pool MemtableFlushWriter: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. MemtableFlushWriter: Writes memtables to disk.

item.name: Thread pool MemtableFlushWriter: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. MemtableFlushWriter: Writes memtables to disk.

item.name: Thread pool MemtablePostFlush: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. MemtablePostFlush: Cleans up commit log after memtable is written to disk.

item.name: Thread pool MemtablePostFlush: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. MemtablePostFlush: Cleans up commit log after memtable is written to disk.

item.name: Thread pool MemtablePostFlush: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. MemtablePostFlush: Cleans up commit log after memtable is written to disk.

item.name: Thread pool MigrationStage: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. MigrationStage: Runs schema migrations.

item.name: Thread pool MigrationStage: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. MigrationStage: Runs schema migrations.

item.name: Thread pool MigrationStage: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. MigrationStage: Runs schema migrations.

item.name: Thread pool MiscStage: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. MiscStage: Miscellaneous tasks run here.

item.name: Thread pool MiscStage: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. MiscStage: Miscellaneous tasks run here.

item.name: Thread pool MiscStage: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. MiscStage: Miscellaneous tasks run here.

item.name: Thread pool SecondaryIndexManagement: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. SecondaryIndexManagement: Performs updates to secondary indexes.

item.name: Thread pool SecondaryIndexManagement: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. SecondaryIndexManagement: Performs updates to secondary indexes.

item.name: Thread pool SecondaryIndexManagement: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. SecondaryIndexManagement: Performs updates to secondary indexes.

item.name: Thread pool CounterMutationStage: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. CounterMutationStage: Responsible for counter writes.

item.name: Thread pool CounterMutationStage: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. CounterMutationStage: Responsible for counter writes.

item.name: Thread pool CounterMutationStage: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. CounterMutationStage: Responsible for counter writes.

item.name: Thread pool MutationStage: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. MutationStage: Responsible for writes (exclude materialized and counter writes).

item.name: Thread pool.MutationStage: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. MutationStage: Responsible for writes (exclude materialized and counter writes).

item.name: Thread pool MutationStage: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. MutationStage: Responsible for writes (exclude materialized and counter writes).

item.name: Thread pool ReadStage: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. ReadStage: Local reads run on this thread pool.

item.name: Thread pool ReadStage: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. ReadStage: Local reads run on this thread pool.

item.name: Thread pool ReadStage: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. ReadStage: Local reads run on this thread pool.

item.name: Thread pool ViewMutationStage: Currently blocked task
item.description: Number of tasks that are currently blocked due to queue saturation but on retry will become unblocked. ViewMutationStage: Responsible for materialized view writes.

item.name: Thread pool ViewMutationStage: Pending tasks
item.description: Number of queued tasks queued up on this pool. ViewMutationStage: Responsible for materialized view writes.

item.name: Thread pool ViewMutationStage: Total blocked tasks
item.description: Number of tasks that were blocked due to queue saturation. ViewMutationStage: Responsible for materialized view writes.

trigger.name: There are down nodes in cluster

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Bloom filter false ratio
item_prototype.description: The ratio of Bloom filter false positives to total checks.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Bytes flushed
item_prototype.description: The amount of data that was flushed since (re)start.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Col update time delta75 percentile
item_prototype.description: The column update time delta - p75.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Col update time delta 95 percentile
item_prototype.description: The column update time delta - p95.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Compaction bytes written
item_prototype.description: The amount of data that was compacted since (re)start.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Compression ratio
item_prototype.description: The compression ratio for all SSTables.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: KeyCache hit rate
item_prototype.description: The key cache hit rate.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Live disk space used
item_prototype.description: The disk space used by "live" SSTables (only counts in use files).

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Live SS Table
item_prototype.description: Number of "live" (in use) SSTables.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Max sartition size
item_prototype.description: The size of the largest compacted partition.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Mean partition size
item_prototype.description: The average size of compacted partition.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Pending compactions
item_prototype.description: The number of pending compactions.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Pending flushes
item_prototype.description: The number of pending flushes.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Read latency 75 percentile
item_prototype.description: Latency read from disk in milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Read latency 95 percentile
item_prototype.description: Latency read from disk in milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Read per second
item_prototype.description: The number of client requests per second.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Row cache hits
item_prototype.description: The number of row cache hits.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Out of row cache hits
item_prototype.description: The number of row cache hits that do not satisfy the query filter and went to disk.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Row cache misses
item_prototype.description: The number of table row cache misses.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Snapshots size
item_prototype.description: The disk space truly used by snapshots.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: SS Tables per read 75 percentile
item_prototype.description: The number of SSTable data files accessed per read - p75.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: SS Tables per read 95 percentile
item_prototype.description: The number of SSTable data files accessed per read - p95.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Tombstone scanned 75 percentile
item_prototype.description: Number of tombstones scanned per read - p75.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Tombstone scanned 95 percentile
item_prototype.description: Number of tombstones scanned per read - p95.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Disk space used
item_prototype.description: Disk space used.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Waiting on free memtable space 75 percentile
item_prototype.description: The time spent waiting for free memtable space either on- or off-heap - p75.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Waiting on free memtable space95 percentile
item_prototype.description: The time spent waiting for free memtable space either on- or off-heap - p95.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Write latency 75 percentile
item_prototype.description: Latency write to disk in milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Write latency 95 percentile
item_prototype.description: Latency write to disk in milliseconds.

item_prototype.name: {#JMXKEYSPACE}.{#JMXSCOPE}: Write per second
item_prototype.description: The number of local write requests per second.
